title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 61.4 - Minimum award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 61.4 - Minimum award

State Regulations

The commission may grant a basic minimum award of not more
than $25 for adopted suggestion resulting in net first year tangible savings or
monetary benefit to the State of $250 or less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
61.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
